headline: Why Moderna Stock Was Down 31.8% in Q1 as the S&P 500 Had Its Worst Quarter Since 2022
summary: The S&P 500 lost 4.6%, and the Nasdaq Composite lost 10.4%.  Following the trend, shares of Moderna (NASDAQ: MRNA) slid 31.8% in the first three months of the year.  More recently, the conspicuous exit of a top Food and Drug Administration (FDA) official has darkened investor sentiment.
